rules.title: Carport parking space dimensions - Plan View

Qualifiers.scope: Carport parking space dimensional standard in plan (top-down) view
Qualifiers.applicability: Applies to carports as depicted in Figure 29 (Parking space dimensions for carport in plan view)
ambiguities: The term 'open' is used without a formal definition; interpreted as unobstructed clear dimension free of structural or architectural elements.
Transverse entrance opening width is labeled 'open' with no numeric value provided.
Presence of 'One of 2 corner columns' is shown diagrammatically and not clearly stated as a requirement.
Footer shows page number 35 while header indicates Page 41; source pagination is inconsistent.

captions: Parking space dimensions for carport in plan view
labels: 20' min. open (longitudinal dimension alongside the parking space)
open (transverse dimension at the entrance; no numeric value shown)

Variables.name: Longitudinal open length
Variables.description: Clear, unobstructed length of the parking space along the vehicle axis within the carport.
Variables.measurement_reference: Measured along the parking space from the entrance inward, free of obstructions.

Variables.name: Entrance transverse open width
Variables.description: Clear, unobstructed width at the entrance opening of the carport.
Variables.measurement_reference: Measured between the inner faces of any supports/columns or edges defining the entrance opening.

Conditions.notes: A clear, unobstructed transverse entrance opening is required, but no numeric minimum is provided in the source; this must be confirmed from other sections or figures.

cross_references.relationship: The 20 ft minimum opening appears consistent with side elevation horizontal opening width.

logical_dependencies: Open (unobstructed) condition applies to all stated minimum dimensions.

rules.title: Carport opening and clearance - Left Side Elevation

Qualifiers.scope: Carport opening dimensions and vertical clearance in left side elevation
Qualifiers.applicability: Applies to carports as depicted in Figure 30 (Left Side Elevation of covered space)
ambiguities: Figure 30 caption refers to 'covered space' which may imply applicability beyond carports; scope assumed to include carports per page header.
The reference line for horizontal opening width is not explicitly defined; assumed to be clear width between supports or structural elements.
The label 'One of 2 corner columns' is illustrative; not clearly normative.

captions: Parking space dimensions for covered space in elevation

Variables.name: Horizontal open width (side elevation)
Variables.description: Clear, unobstructed horizontal opening width visible in side elevation.
Variables.measurement_reference: Measured between inner faces of supports/columns or structural boundaries defining the side opening.

Variables.name: Vertical clearance to bottom of roof system
Variables.description: Clear, unobstructed vertical clearance from driveway/parking surface to the bottom of the roof system.
Variables.measurement_reference: From finished driveway/parking surface to the lowest point of the bottom roof system.

Conditions.notes: Measured to the bottom of the roof system; must be unobstructed.

cross_references.relationship: Horizontal opening width of 20 ft aligns with plan-view longitudinal minimum length.
Shares the same vertical clearance minimum (7 ft).

logical_dependencies: Vertical clearance is constrained by the bottom of the roof system.
Open (unobstructed) condition applies to both horizontal and vertical dimensions.

rules.title: Carport opening and clearance - Front Elevation

Qualifiers.scope: Carport entrance opening width and vertical clearance in front elevation
Qualifiers.applicability: Applies to carports as depicted in Figure 30 (Front Elevation of covered space)
ambiguities: Figure 30 caption uses 'covered space'; assumed applicable to carports per page header.
The label uses 'min' without period ('10' min open'); interpreted consistently as 'minimum open'.
Exact measurement points for horizontal opening width are not explicitly defined; assumed between inner faces of corner columns or structural boundaries.

captions: Parking space dimensions for covered space in elevation

Variables.name: Horizontal open width (front elevation)
Variables.description: Clear, unobstructed horizontal opening width at the carport entrance as viewed from the front.
Variables.measurement_reference: Measured between inner faces of entrance supports/columns or structural boundaries defining the opening.

Variables.name: Vertical clearance to bottom of roof system (front elevation)
Variables.description: Clear, unobstructed vertical clearance from driveway/parking surface to the bottom of the roof system at the entrance.
Variables.measurement_reference: From finished driveway/parking surface to the lowest point of the bottom roof system.

Conditions.notes: Measured to the bottom of the roof system; must be unobstructed.

cross_references.relationship: Shares the same minimum vertical clearance (7 ft) requirement.

logical_dependencies: Open (unobstructed) condition applies to both horizontal and vertical dimensions.
